title: Unable to log in, and post comments on forum
body: Have not logged onto league for 13 hours or so. Opened up the client this morning and am unable to login. getting the same msg's as the other people have stated. Also, unable to comment on their posts, therefor i had to make another post. There are a few people having this login problem on discord too. Some were in client and it bugged out, some have only just attempted to login recently. ty xo
